title: Wupatki National Monument: Virtual Pueblo Tour
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour     Virtual Pueblo Tour                Virtual Pueblo Tour       The four virtual tours below will take you through a series of rooms in Wupatki Pueblo. They were shot during an archeological backfill project. Panning down to the floor in the first video you will notice a modern irrigation pipe that was put in to help divert rainwater out of the room thus helping to protect the pueblo's structural integrity. Enjoy!       (object placeholder)       (object placeholder)       (object placeholder)       (object placeholder)
